newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: KL stock market closed for Labour Day holiday.
newsitem.headline: KL stock market closed for Labour Day holiday.

text.p: The Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange is closed on Thursday for the Labour Day holiday.

On Wednesday the key Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange's Composite Index ended up 20.66 points to 1,080.17, buoyed by a firmer U.S. market and news of power utility Tenaga Nasional Bhd receiving a long-awaited tariff increase.
Volume stood at 242 million shares valued at 1,525 million ringgit.
